Uses of Interface
evs.metric.metrics.ThresholdMetric

Packages that use ThresholdMetric
evs.metric.metrics Verification metrics for the ensemble mean and (ensemble-derived) forecast probabilities. 
 

Uses of ThresholdMetric in evs.metric.metrics
 

Classes in evs.metric.metrics that implement ThresholdMetric
 class BrierScore
          The Brier score is the mean squared error of a dichotomous forecast event in probability space.
 class BrierSkillScore
          The Brier skill score measures skill in terms of the Brier Score (BS) and is given by: 1.0 - (BS of forecast system / BS of reference forecast system).
 class Correlation
          Computes the linear association between the forecasts and observations using Pearson's product moment correlation coefficient.
 class MeanAbsoluteError
          Computes the mean absolute difference between the forecasts and observations.
 class MeanCaptureRateDiagram
          The mean capture rate diagram plots the average probability with which a randomly chosen ensemble member will have a given absolute error.
 class MeanContRankProbScore
          The Continuous Ranked Probability Score (CRPS) is the integrated squared difference between the cumulative distributions of the forecasts and the observations, where the cdf of the observations is given by the Heaviside function (pdf is the dirac delta function).
 class MeanContRankProbSkillScore
          The Mean CRPS skill score measures skill in terms of the Mean CRPS (MCRPS) and is given by: (MCRPS of forecast system - MCRPS of reference forecast system)/(0 - MCRPS of reference forecast system).
 class MeanError
          Computes the mean difference between the forecasts and observations, which is indicative of first-order bias in the forecasts.
 class MeanErrorOfProbabilityDiagram
          The mean error of probability diagram plots the difference between the observed climatological probability and the average forecast probability for a given real value of the observed variable and plots the residual as a function of the real value, repeated for a set of real values.
 class RankHistogram
          The rank histogram is similar to the spread-bias diagram where the intervals correspond to the ranked ensemble members.
 class RelativeMeanError
          Computes the mean difference between the forecasts and observations, which is indicative of first-order bias in the forecasts, divided by the mean of the observations.
 class RelativeOperatingCharacteristic
          The Relative Operating Characteristic (also known as the Receiver Operating Characteristic) plots the probability of successful detection for an event against the probability of failed detection.
 class ReliabilityDiagram
          Constructs a reliability diagram for specified forecast probability thresholds and probability thresholds of the observations given the forecasts.
 class ROCScore
          The ROC score comprises the rescaled area under the ROC curve (AUC), which provides a measure of a probability forecasts ability to discriminate between events and non-events according to the observed outcome at different forecast probability levels.
 class RootMeanSquareError
          The Root Mean Squared Error (RMSE) is the square root of the mean squared difference between the single valued forecasts and corresponding observations.
 class SampleSize
          Convenience metric that computes the sample sizes available for each forecast lead time, and by threshold, if available.
 class SingleValuedQQPlot
          The SingleValuedQQPlot provides a comparison of the order statistics of the observed values and single-valued forecast values, which may be derived from an ensemble forecast using a specified function (e.g.
 class SpreadBiasDiagram
          The spread-bias plot shows the fraction of observations falling in a given probability interval on the forecast support, which should be equal to the width of that interval (in the case of perfect reliability).
 

Methods in evs.metric.metrics with parameters of type ThresholdMetric
 void ThresholdMetricStore.addMetric(ThresholdMetric threshold)
          Adds another threshold metric to the store.
 

Constructors in evs.metric.metrics with parameters of type ThresholdMetric
ThresholdMetricStore(ThresholdMetric metric)
          Constructs a new store with a single threshold metric.
ThresholdMetricStore(ThresholdMetric[] metric)
          Constructs a new store with a set of threshold metrics, which must be of the same class and have different threshold parameter values.
